rev.desc.rev.desc: update start panel, update log file name
update panel use.table.sigs:
if ($L.type=3) then $L.z+=($L.temp+"='"+jscall("tzFunctions.convertDateStringToGMT", str($L.temp in $L.file))+"'");
update panel already.exists, change code to:
$L.already.exists.msg=scmsg(48, "patchrel", {object.name in $L.out})
update panel use.table.sigs, fix datetime type error:
if ($L.type=3) then $L.z+=($L.temp+"='"+str($L.temp in $L.file)+"'")
update panel start.table.loop, because of the update of signaturemake help record
Panel: start.table.loop
Fixed erddef exception code for the strrep function.
QC8975 - Cleanup of code on panel=use.table.sigs to support cumulative patches
Modification made for CenterPoint Request 37109 Task 32931.
Two problems:
1) The signatures for the Italian formats were not being picked up.
2) Spanish was added as a language in SC6.1.
To correct this, the 11th line on panel start.code.loop was changed
from

if ($L.table="help") then ($L.send.sql="object.type = \""+$L.table+"\" and (object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"en\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"de\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"fr\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"ja\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"iten\")")
to

if ($L.table="help") then ($L.send.sql="object.type = \""+$L.table+"\" and (object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"en\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"de\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"fr\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"ja\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"iten\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"es\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"it\" )")
Converted to use scmsg().

descript.descript: update start panel, update log file name
update panel use.table.sigs:
if ($L.type=3) then $L.z+=($L.temp+"='"+jscall("tzFunctions.convertDateStringToGMT", str($L.temp in $L.file))+"'");
update panel already.exists, change code to:
$L.already.exists.msg=scmsg(48, "patchrel", {object.name in $L.out})
update panel use.table.sigs, fix datetime type error:
if ($L.type=3) then $L.z+=($L.temp+"='"+str($L.temp in $L.file)+"'")
update panel start.table.loop, because of the update of signaturemake help record
Panel: start.table.loop
Fixed erddef exception code for the strrep function.
QC8975 - Cleanup of code on panel=use.table.sigs to support cumulative patches
Modification made for CenterPoint Request 37109 Task 32931.
Two problems:
1) The signatures for the Italian formats were not being picked up.
2) Spanish was added as a language in SC6.1.
To correct this, the 11th line on panel start.code.loop was changed
from

if ($L.table="help") then ($L.send.sql="object.type = \""+$L.table+"\" and (object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"en\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"de\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"fr\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"ja\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"iten\")")
to

if ($L.table="help") then ($L.send.sql="object.type = \""+$L.table+"\" and (object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"en\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"de\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"fr\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"ja\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"iten\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"es\" or object.name =\""+$L.hobname+"it\" )")
Converted to use scmsg().
